title: Textile, "The Grenadier and the Nun", 1849
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
description: Two scenes, captioned in french, showing a nun and a grenadier within a grid of branches, leaves and berries. In brown on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "The Grenadier and the Nun", 1849.
1849. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-169.
